text:
Hugh Robertson Anderson (born 18 January 1936) is a former New Zealand motorcyclist. He is a four-time Grand Prix motorcycle road racing World Champion and a 19-time New Zealand national champion. He is also a two-time Isle of Man TT winner. In 1995, he was added into the New Zealand Sports Hall of Fame.
Anderson was born in Auckland. He spent his early years in Huntly.

annotations.surface_form: New Zealand Sports Hall of Fame
